statements: SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE map_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM mapping_information WHERE road_type = 'Highway';
SELECT road_type, lane_information FROM mapping_information WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT map_id, traffic_signs FROM mapping_information WHERE longitude < -75;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE map_id > 3 ORDER BY road_type DESC, map_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE map_id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude, road_type FROM mapping_information WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0;
SELECT map_id, road_type, JSON_LENGTH(lane_information) AS lane_count FROM mapping_information WHERE JSON_LENGTH(lane_information) > 2;
SELECT map_id, latitude, longitude, road_type FROM mapping_information WHERE road_type = 'Highway' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT map_id, latitude, longitude, road_type, JSON_KEYS(traffic_signs) AS sign_types FROM mapping_information WHERE JSON_KEYS(traffic_signs) IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE car_id = 1;
SELECT mapping_id, location_id FROM mapping_information WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT car_id, map_data FROM mapping_information WHERE car_id = 3;
SELECT navigation_id, destination_id FROM navigation_data WHERE destination_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE mapping_id = 1;
SELECT car_id, location_id FROM mapping_information WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT car_id, destination_id, timestamp FROM navigation_data WHERE car_id = 2 AND destination_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information JOIN navigation_data ON mapping_information.car_id = navigation_data.car_id;

SELECT mapping_information.mapping_id, navigation_data.navigation_id FROM mapping_information, navigation_data WHERE mapping_information.car_id = navigation_data.car_id AND navigation_data.destination_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information;
SELECT id, location_id FROM mapping_information WHERE location_id = 123;
SELECT car_id, destination_location FROM localization_data WHERE car_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM navigation_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Turn Right';
SELECT id, car_id, timestamp FROM navigation_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM mapping_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, location_id, map_data FROM mapping_information WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM localization_data WHERE car_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, current_location->>'city' AS city FROM localization_data WHERE current_location->>'country' = 'USA';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM navigation_logs WHERE car_id = 2 AND action_taken LIKE '%turn%';
SELECT * FROM MappingData;
SELECT street_name, latitude, longitude FROM MappingData WHERE street_name = 'Main Street' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model, year FROM VehicleDetails WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_time FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_id, mapping_timestamp, mapping_status FROM MappingHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM MappingData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM MappingData WHERE street_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT id, street_name FROM MappingData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year FROM VehicleDetails WHERE model = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM MappingPoints ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT point_id, description FROM MappingPoints WHERE point_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Roads WHERE road_type = 'Highway';
SELECT road_name, start_point_id, end_point_id FROM Roads WHERE road_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT sign_name, sign_description, latitude FROM TrafficSigns ORDER BY sign_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_type, color FROM Vehicles WHERE production_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM MappingPoints;
SELECT road_name, road_type FROM Roads WHERE road_type='Highway';
SELECT sign_name, sign_description FROM TrafficSigns ORDER BY sign_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, color FROM Vehicles WHERE color IS NOT NULL;
SELECT point1_id, point2_id, distance FROM Distances WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
